altername_name: Ao Zora to Nakama Tachi: Yume no Bouken Plus
Aozora to Nakama-tachi - Yume no Bouken Plus
name: Ao Zora to Nakama Tachi: Yume no Bouken
overview: Ao Zora To Nakama Tachi - Yume No Bouken is a platform game that was released in Gameboy Advance and Playstation One consoles in 2003. The game features Ao Zora that is a blue elephant that transport in his back a friend animal in a plataform game with a boss stage at the end of the level that can be defeated after a riddle contest. Ao Zora is the mascot character of Aozora Bank, The game is divided into 2 different part: A platform part with jumping parts and eliminate the enemies that come across the players character, and the end of boss level that features a quiz challenge with more than 500 questions for all the game boses, if the player wants to defeat the boss and advance through the game have to answer right all the questions. Aozora Bank's mascot, the action game hero Ao Zora PS blue elephant appeared. Or fellow put on his back, let go the stage action with the long nose elephant unique unique. Boss fight with the end of each stage, the confrontation riddles. Aim to answer all the questions of the riddle in all 500 questions were also included.
